name: UNKNOT
description:
Color the segments of knot diagrams with three colors in a short minimalistic puzzle game. 

On each level find a coloring which satisfies the following three rules:

  • color all the segments
  • use more than one color
  • all lines should be colored the same or different at each intersection.

The game features 12+3 levels. It provides a relaxing experience but is not particularly challenging.

Note: this is a pet project of mine. This means it was not thoroughly tested, may have some quality issues, has no music, the sound design is wonky, has no digital signature, and probably won't be updated - ever.

Made with Godot, Inkscape, BFXR and Gimp.
